attributes.action: warn that Microsoft Internet Explorer should no longer be used
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Internet Explorer is an internet security hazard akin to leaving the windows in your home open. 

The German government has warned web users to find an alternative browser to Internet Explorer to protect security. The British Government should follow suit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
